body: These +1 firearm bullets deal no damage, but instead cause a pale glow to outline the target, granting the effect of a faerie fire spell and causing the target to take a –2 penalty to AC against ranged attacks. These effects last for 1d4 rounds.
name: Tracer Bullet
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Weapons/Tracer Bullet
